attributes.action: Give Year 11's predicted grades because of stress caused from Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to expect students to sit GCES because it is currently not safe for young people  to travel on public transport to visit tutors and there are distractions at schools because of the panic of the worlds worse health implication.
attributes.background: The government need to call of all GCSE exams due to the stress being placed on young people and families

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
